import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Form,Row, Col, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './CreatePage.css'; class CreatePage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ name: null, address: null, rating: null, type: "beach", picture: null, typeList: ["Beach", "Hills", "Fountain", "Landmark"], } } createOptinos = () => this.state.typeList.length ? this.state.typeList.map(data => ) : ""; render() { return (

Add a New Tourist Place



Name:

Address:

Rating:

Type: {this.createOptinos()}

Picture:

); } } export default CreatePage;
